text: I understand that we deploy chaincode ony once. In practice, the chaincode can be updated in time. So how to redeploy in an effective way?

<@U11TAFPUP> <@U195M30MD>  currently, there is not satisfactory solution to “redeploy” and in general maintenance.  The best you can do is “deploy” a variation. As <@U0KPFAZNF> pointed out there is planning in progress to upgrade and terminate no specific timeline at the moment unfortunately…but should happen after due process in the community
by the way, a state of a chaincode that stored in the world state is cloned to all validators or it is kept locally ?
Could you please explain it with more information, <@U0KPFAZNF> ?
I'm out on mobile right now.  Will later
